data.text: @kerkerlicious She’s got Pete in her corner and he will help her cope with this he knows it’s not easy for her so he’s gonna help in every way possible. Well I’d hope because that’s what he SHOULD do as her significant other

@kirkland_marc Same, only ranting because I can semi see a connection w the situation. Not cool man, but yanno how ignorant twitter is. Hopefully Ariana doesn't let all the negative/insensitive comments affect her in any way, that's such a huge burden &  shame on everybody who is pursuing it.

@kerkerlicious And I’ve done the blaming but I had to realize that person wanted out and we agreed on it just like they did. I feel for her and his family, friends and fans but blaming her isn’t the right thing to do. Well said Ker

@kerkerlicious Couldn’t have said it any better. The internet will eat you alive if you let it. Hell im sure she’s blaming herself anyways but you can’t blame her or anyone for that matter for wanting out of a relationship I’ve been in and dealt with this exact same thing.

she loved Mac more than anything & knew the problems they were having were greater than her. So they BOTH decided to split for the better of BOTH sides. After the split it was on themselves for what happened next. How can y'all even blame what happened on one person. Y'all wild
coming from somebody who respects both artists and sees both sides of the situation as much as given.

She's 100% mourning with the rest of the population regarding his death & blaming his OD on her is insensitive & ignorant. Blaming somebody else for a self harming issue is SO wrong & inconsiderate. Tired of seeing these stupid ass tweets abt how it's her fault for his actions.
